archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.3.9a: a) handled in accordance with relevant legislation (e.g. the EU General Data Protection Regulation 2016/679 (GDPR), the EU e-Privacy Directive 2002/58 and the US Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act (HIPAA))
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
